{{Description|"If you bury dark emotions for too long, they will become nightmares. With that in mind, why don't we turn them into 'delicious snacks' while we've got the time?"}}
'''Anraku Secret Spring Therapy''' is [[Yumemizuki Mizuki]]'s [[Elemental Burst]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* Yumemi Style Special Snack is created every '''1.5''' second; thus '''8''' Special Snacks can be created during the Burst's duration.
* Special Snack is always created at the nearest enemy or Mizuki's location if no enemy is nearby.
* Special Snack explodes after '''4''' second if not picked up.

;<big>Constellation Effects</big>
* {{Talent Note|constellation|4|Buds Warm Lucid Springs}}
* {{Talent Note|constellation|5|As Setting Moon Brings Year's End}}
